lead_paragraph: A federal court appearance is scheduled Monday for the Japanese company whose airbags have been linked to 11 deaths, and the Commerce Department will update its fourth-quarter economic growth figure.
snippet: A federal court appearance is scheduled Monday for the Japanese company whose airbags have been linked to 11 deaths, and the Commerce Department will update its fourth-quarter economic growth figure....

headline.main: Guilty Plea Coming From Takata, and G.D.P. Estimate Will Be Revised
headline.print_headline: Takata’s Airbag Plea Due,  as Is New G.D.P. Estimate
